ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 117
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have SoW, you can play something else besides Selo s and still have the speed you need and the benefits of the other song. Sylly. ... From:	Bard
ygData.messageBody:
If you have SoW, you can play something else besides Selo's and still have
the speed you need and the benefits of the other song.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bard [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Saturday, June 19, 1999 12:46 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 117

From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

<And I don't understand where you think we are "supposed to
be the
most traveling class in Norrath". >

If you must know, I tought I had read it at the EQ/Station
site. I went
back to check but I was mistaken, I must have read it
somewhere else.

<. I think most Bards would prefer to have this "bug" in
the game>
Why? When grouping with others it disrupts two of their
most often used
spells? I would think the opposite would be true. Granted,
I can always
get a SoW from someone in the group, but why let them waste
the mana when
Selo's is faster (at least for me)?
